systemPipeShiny 0.0.9
  • Get started
  • Articles
    • VZ

Reference

All functions

ViewSpsDefaults()

Print systemPipeShiny default Options

addData() getData() addPlot() getPlot()

Add and get data between shiny modules

checkNameSpace()

check namespace Help you to check if you have certain packages and return missing package names

clearableTextInput()

Input component with a "X" button in the end to clear the entire typed text work the same as `Textinput` must be call `useSps` at header

deg_deseq2()

Plots a Bar Plot using run_DESeq2 to create a DESeq2 data frame of differentially expressed genes.

deg_edgeR()

Plots a Bar Plot using run_edgeR to create a edgeR data frame of differentially expressed genes.

devComponents()

Create template tabs and servers

dynamicFile()

dynamically generate select file input depending on the mode in options, render similar UI but server side works differently. `local` mode will not copy file, directly use a path pointer, `server` mode upload file and store in temp. Expect similar behavior as `fileInput`.

dynamicFileServer()

Server side function for dynamicFile

findTabInfo()

Find tab information from tabs.csv

findTreeParent()

find parent steps of from output of jsTree

gallery()

A shiny gallery component `texts`, `hrefs`, `images` Must have the same length Must be used with Bootstrap3 and sps.css file

genGallery()

generate gallery by only providing tab names

genHrefTable()

generate a table of lists of hyper reference buttons by using tab config file

hrefTab() genHrefTab()

Show a list of tabs in buttons

hrefTable()

A table of lists of hyper reference buttons `item_titles`, `item_labels`, `item_hrefs` must have the same length nth item in `item_labels`, `item_hrefs` must have the same length

loadDF()

Load tibbles to server

msg()

SPS terminal message

pgPaneUpdate() pgPaneUI()

A draggable progress panel Use `pgPaneUI` on UI side and use `pgPaneUpdate` to update it. The UI only renders correctly inside `shinydashboard` or `shinydashboardPlus`.

quiet()

supress cat output

remove_ANSI()

Remove ANSI color code

renderDesc()

Render tab description

resolveOptions()

Resolve SPS options need to use the sps_options.yaml file

runSPS()

Start systemPipeShiny

run_CLUST()

Plots Hierarchical Clustering dendrogram between samples using a count dataframe and a targets file.

run_GLM()

Plots Generalized Principal Component Analysis performed on raw counts using a count dataframe and a targets file.

run_HEAT()

Plots a hierarchical clustering heat map using a count dataframe and a targets file.

run_MDS()

Plots Multidimensional Scaling based on pairwise distances between samples using a count dataframe and a targets file.

run_PCA()

Plots Principal Component Analysis from a count dataframe and a targets file.

run_TSNE()

Plots t-Distributed Stochastic Neighbor Embedding between samples using a count dataframe and a targets file.

run_volcano()

Plots a Volcano Plot from an edgeR or DESeq2 data frame.

shinyCatch()

Catch error, warning, message text catcher

shinyCheckPkg()

check name space in server check name space and pop up warnings in shiny if package is missing

spsHr()

hr line with color #3b8dbc38

spsUI()

render the app UI Combine mainUI defined in ui.R and add the loading screen and more

spsValidator()

Validate some inputs

step2listD3()

Create structure for networkD3 object

step2listTree()

Title Take steps output from subsetRmd and change to a nested list structure Data prepare for ShinyTree

textInputGroup()

Text input with a button right next to

uiExamples()

Example UI elements for plotting

useSps()

Use SystemPipeShiny javascripts and css style call it in your header section

wfPanel()

Workflow progress tracker UI

wfProgressPanel()

Workflow Progress tracker server logic

Contents

Developed by Daniela Cassol, Thomas Girke, Le Zhang, Ponmathi Ramasamy.
